title: Norbert: What Can Little Me Do?
description: Norbert: What Can Little Me Do? is an internationally award-winning children's picture book inspired by a real 3-pound registered therapy dog. This exquisitely illustrated tale is about a delightful and determined tiny hero who discovers his unique gift for helping others. Norbert, a Pet PartnerÂ® dog, tells the tale through his personal artist's journal. The story shows you don't need to be big to make a BIG difference in the world. I had no idea what a little 3-pound dog like me could do in such a huge place. I was surprised to discover the answer, and I bet you will be, too!" writes Norbert on the book's dust jacket.Norbert is a trademark of Polly Parker Press.
author: Julie Freyermuth
